ygData.subject: RE: Re: Lambent stone price, Staff of Solusek RO?
ygData.msgSnippet: i forget what the stats are, its a wiz only staff i think, and i know a guy on my server that traded the staff for a writhing staff hehe... go figure a tank
ygData.messageBody:
i forget what the stats are, its a wiz only staff i think, and i know a guy
on my server that traded the staff for a writhing staff hehe... go figure

a tank screwing over a wizard, thats a first...

Minkin
Sol ro
